I've not had the crashing issues that others have had, so let's start at five stars.  But buffering is a big issue and the stream is far from smooth, almost like it's a low frame rate stream. So let's take away a star. I'm also finding it a major irritation that when you've watched a program you get...Full ReviewI've not had the crashing issues that others have had, so let's start at five stars.  But buffering is a big issue and the stream is far from smooth, almost like it's a low frame rate stream. So let's take away a star. I'm also finding it a major irritation that when you've watched a program you get returned to the main page. No option to watch the next episode, and no way to bookmark favourites, so you have to search again for the program you've just watched in order to carry on watching! Take away two stars.  Technically the app is "adequate", but the user interface and general experience is pretty dire. Take away another star.  The lack of personalisation (e.g. bookmarking favourites) makes it clear that the need to log in is only aimed at them gathering personal data for marketing/advertising, or for on-selling. Otherwise why not just let people watch without a login being set up? So take away another star. And what's with the volume of the ads? Be ready with that mute button because the normal volume level of the program you're watching changes to something that'll blow your speakers when the ads start. So take away a star. Yeah. Negative stars.
